title: Only With the Heart
description: After growing up in foster homes, Claudia has found the perfect life with a devoted husband and loving mother, but her new world is turned upside down when her mother is diagnosed with Alzheimer's, a situation that becomes worse when her mother is found dead and Claudia is charged with murder, in an engrossing tale of terminal illness, love, and the struggle for acceptance. Reprint. 10,000 first printing.
author: Alexandria Constantinova Szeman
